verses.text: A good \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \w precious|strong="H2896"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*; and the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w* than the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w one’s birth|strong="H3205"\w*.

¶ \add It is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*, than to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w*: \w for|strong="H0834"\w* that \add is\add* the \w end|strong="H5490"\w* of all \w men|strong="H0120"\w*; and the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* to his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Sorrow|strong="H3708"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w*: for by the \w sadness|strong="H7455"\w* of the \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is made \w better|strong="H3190"\w*.\f + \fr 7.3 \ft Sorrow: or, Anger\f*

The \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add is\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*; but the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \add is\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w mirth|strong="H8057"\w*.

\add It is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, than for a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w song|strong="H7892"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*.

For as the \w crackling|strong="H6963"\w* of \w thorns|strong="H5518"\w* under a \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*, so \add is\add* the \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w* of the \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*: this also \add is\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.\f + \fr 7.6 \ft crackling: Heb. sound\f*

¶ Surely \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w* maketh a wise \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w mad|strong="H1984"\w*; and a \w gift|strong="H4979"\w* \w destroyeth|strong="H0006"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* of a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* than the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* thereof: \add and\add* the \w patient|strong="H0750"\w* in \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than the \w proud|strong="H1362"\w* in \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

Be not \w hasty|strong="H0926"\w* in thy \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* to be \w angry|strong="H3707"\w*: for \w anger|strong="H3708"\w* \w resteth|strong="H5117"\w* in the \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* not thou, What is \add the cause\add* that the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* were \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than these? for thou dost not \w enquire|strong="H7592"\w* \w wisely|strong="H2451"\w* concerning this.\f + \fr 7.10 \ft wisely: Heb. out of wisdom\f*

¶ \w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* with an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: and \add by it there is\add* \w profit|strong="H3148"\w* to them that \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*.\f + \fr 7.11 \ft good…: or, as good as an inheritance, yea, better too\f*

For \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add is\add* a \w defence|strong="H6738"\w*, \add and\add* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \add is\add* a \w defence|strong="H6738"\w*: but the \w excellency|strong="H3504"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \add is, that\add* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* giveth \w life|strong="H2421"\w* to them that \w have|strong="H1167"\w* it.\f + \fr 7.12 \ft defence: Heb. shadow\f*

\w Consider|strong="H7200"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for who \w can|strong="H3201"\w* make \add that\add* \w straight|strong="H8626"\w*, which he hath made \w crooked|strong="H5791"\w*?

In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w* be \w joyful|strong="H2896"\w*, but in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w adversity|strong="H7451"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* also hath \w set|strong="H6213"\w* the one over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the other, to the \w end|strong="H1700"\w* that \w man|strong="H0120"\w* should \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3972"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.\f + \fr 7.14 \ft set: Heb. made\f*

All \add things\add* have I \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*: there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add* that \w perisheth|strong="H0006"\w* in his \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and there is a \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man\add* that \w prolongeth|strong="H0748"\w* \add his life\add* in his \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

Be not \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* over \w much|strong="H7235"\w*; neither make thyself \w over|strong="H3148"\w* \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*: why shouldest thou \w destroy|strong="H8074"\w* thyself?\f + \fr 7.16 \ft destroy…: Heb. be desolate?\f*

Be not over \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7561"\w*, neither be thou \w foolish|strong="H5530"\w*: why shouldest thou \w die|strong="H4191"\w* before thy \w time|strong="H6256"\w*?\f + \fr 7.17 \ft before…: Heb. not in thy time?\f*

\add It is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* that thou shouldest take \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* of this; yea, also from \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w withdraw|strong="H3240"\w* not thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: for he that \w feareth|strong="H3373"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of them all.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w strengtheneth|strong="H5810"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* more than \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7989"\w* \add men\add* which are in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

For \add there is\add* not a \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w* not.

Also \w take|strong="H5414"\w* no \w heed|strong="H3820"\w* unto all \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that are \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*; lest thou \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* thee:\f + \fr 7.21 \ft take…: Heb. give not thine heart\f*
For \w oftentimes|strong="H6471"\w* also thine own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* that thou thyself likewise hast \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* \w others|strong="H0312"\w*.

¶ All \w this|strong="H2090"\w* have I \w proved|strong="H5254"\w* by \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will be \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*; but it \add was\add* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* from me.
That which is far \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, and exceeding \w deep|strong="H6013"\w*, who can find it \w out|strong="H4672"\w*?

I \w applied|strong="H5437"\w* mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, and to \w search|strong="H8446"\w*, and to seek \w out|strong="H1245"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and the \w reason|strong="H2808"\w* \add of things\add*, and to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* of \w folly|strong="H3689"\w*, even of \w foolishness|strong="H5531"\w* \add and\add* \w madness|strong="H1947"\w*:\f + \fr 7.25 \ft I applied…: Heb. I and mine heart compassed\f*

And I \w find|strong="H4672"\w* more \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* than \w death|strong="H4194"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* \w snares|strong="H4685"\w* and \w nets|strong="H2764"\w*, \add and\add* her \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add as\add* \w bands|strong="H0612"\w*: whoso \w pleaseth|strong="H2896"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* from her; but the \w sinner|strong="H2398"\w* shall be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* by her.\f + \fr 7.26 \ft whoso…: Heb. he that is good before God\f*

\w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, this have I \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w preacher|strong="H6953"\w*, \add counting\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* by \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, to find \w out|strong="H4672"\w* the \w account|strong="H2808"\w*:\f + \fr 7.27 \ft counting…: or, weighing one thing after another, to find out the reason\f*

Which yet my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w*, but I \w find|strong="H4672"\w* not: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* among a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* have I \w found|strong="H4672"\w*; but a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* among all those have I not \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w Lo|strong="H7200"\w*, this \w only|strong="H0905"\w* have I \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*; but they have sought \w out|strong="H1245"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w inventions|strong="H2810"\w*.
